info.name: DNA-C Platform Intent API v1.2.6 GA

header.description: (string, required) Basic Auth Base64 encoding of <username>:<password>

request.description:
API to obtain an access token. The token obtained using this API is required to be set as value to the X-Auth-Token HTTP Header for all API calls to Cisco DNA Center.

###### Response Model
- AuthenticationAPIResponse
  - Token: string

query.description: (string, required) Epoch time(in milliseconds) when the Client health data is required
(string, required) MAC Address of the client

header.description: (boolean, required) Enable this parameter to execute the API and return a response synchronously

(number, required) If __runsync is set to ‘true’, this defines the maximum time before which if the API completes its execution, then a synchronous response is returned.  If the time taken for the API to complete the execution, exceeds this time, then an asynchronous response is returned with an execution id, that can be used to get the status and response associated with the API execution
(string, required) Enable this parameter to ensure that the synchronous response of the API is made available as part of the logs and the execution status

request.description:
Returns list of devices based on filter crieteria. If a limit is not specified, it will default to return 50 devices. Pagination and sorting are also supported by this endpoint

request.description:
Claims one of more devices with specified workflow

###### Request Model
- ClaimDeviceRequest
  - configFileUrl: string
  - configId: string
  - deviceClaimList: array
    - configList: array
      - configId: string
      - configParameters: array
        - key: string
        - value: string
    - deviceId: string
    - licenseLevel: string
    - licenseType: string
    - topOfStackSerialNumber: string
  - fileServiceId: string
  - imageId: string
  - imageUrl: string
  - populateInventory: boolean
  - projectId: string
  - workflowId: string


###### Response Model
- ClaimDeviceResponse
  - jsonArrayResponse: array
  - jsonResponse
  - message: string
  - statusCode: number

Returns the device count based on filter criteria. This is useful for pagination

###### Response Model
- GetDeviceCountResponse
  - response: number

query.description: (array[string], optional) Comma seperated list of fields to sort on
(string, optional) Sort Order Ascending (asc) or Descending (des)

request.description:
Returns history for a specific device. Serial number is a required parameter

###### Response Model
- GetDeviceHistoryResponse
  - response: array
    - timestamp: number
    - details: string
    - historyTaskInfo
      - name: string
      - type: string
      - timeTaken: number
      - workItemList: array
        - state: string
        - command: string
        - startTime: number
        - endTime: number
        - timeTaken: number
        - outputStr: string
      - addnDetails: array
        - key: string
        - value: string
    - errorFlag: boolean
  - statusCode: number
